1010101000110001 0101010001010110 1 -> sum: 1111111010001000, cout: 0
1001101001111101 1101000100011010 1 -> sum: 0110101110011000, cout: 1

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
